page.title: 19TOURISM - LACEY GREEN
page.content: THE CHILTERN AREA ATTRACTS TOURISTS AND IN LACEY GREEN AND SURROUNDS THERE IS MUCH TO INTEREST THEM. THE{BEECH- {WOODS}ARE BEAUTIFUL IN SPRING AND AUTUMN; THE{WINDMILL}IS OPEN IN THE SUMMER MONTHS. ON THE EDGE OF SPEEN IS {THE HOME OF REST FOR HORSES,}A POPULAR PLACE FOR FAMILY VISITS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR. RUN AS A CHARITY, IT HAS MANY HORSES AND SOME DONKEYS, INCLUDING FAMOUS ANIMALS USED BY ROYALTY AND INVOLVED IN TERRORIST ATTACKS! THE {FORGE}AT LOOSLEY ROW IS AN INTERESTING PLACE TO VISIT. MANY FOOTPATHS ARE MARKED AND WALKERS MAKE GOOD USE OF THEM. THEY CAN STAY OVERNIGHT AT A {YOUTH HOSTEL}IN NEARBY BRADENHAM. THERE ARE ALSO BRIDLE PATHS FOR THE MANY HORSERIDERS. WELL SPREAD AROUND THE DISTRICT ARE{5 PUBLIC HOUSES,}ALL SERVING MEALS AS WELL AS DRINKS.
